meanings.definition: The state of being hoary or gray with age.
meanings.sent1: The hoarinesses of the old tree's bark showed its many years.
meanings.sent2: The hoarinesses of the mountain peaks indicated their age.
meanings.sent3: The hoarinesses of the wise owl's feathers made it look distinguished.
meanings.sent4: The hoarinesses of the ancient ruins whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The hoarinesses of the grandfather's hair revealed a lifetime of experiences.

meanings.definition: The quality of being ancient or old-fashioned.
meanings.sent1: The hoarinesses of the traditional ceremony delighted the villagers.
meanings.sent2: The hoarinesses of the vintage dress made it a timeless classic.
meanings.sent3: The hoarinesses of the retro music brought a nostalgic smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: The hoarinesses of the antique clock added charm to the room.
meanings.sent5: The hoarinesses of the ancient manuscript held secrets of the past.
